meta.name: description
meta.content: San Juan School District serves over 3,000 students in 12 schools and we are located in one of the most geographically diverse places in the world. We invite you to take your next adventure with us as we seek to unite, educate, and empower.

div.div: Thank you for your patience and support during this uncertain time of implementing home instruction. As we move into the final 4 weeks of school this year we would appreciate any feedback that could help our teachers, staff, and administration better support your needs with instructional support at home. Please take a few minutes to complete this survey to help us do the best we can to support you and your child(ren).
Please be informed that the San Juan School District Board of Education will hold its board meeting on April 8, 2020, at the District Office in Blanding, Utah.
Thank you parents for your support during our at home learning. Please read this letter from Superintendent Nielson.
